Package controller

Class Management

java.lang.Object
controller.Management
public class Management extends Object
This class handles the database of all the toys.
Version:
03-031-2024
Author:
Bryan, John

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true or false depending if the price is valid
      Throws:

    • validPlayerAmount

      private boolean validPlayerAmount(int max, int min) throws PlayerAmountException
      This method validates the player amount
      Parameters:
      max - is the maximum players inputed by the user
      min - is the minimum players inputed by the user
      Returns:
      true or false depending if the player amount is valid
      Throws:
      PlayerAmountException - if the PlayerAmountException error occurs

      Returns:
